import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Bar}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Chart as ChartJS,Title,Tooltip,Legend,BarElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale}from"chart.js";// Register necessary Chart.js components
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(Title,Tooltip,Legend,BarElement,CategoryScale,LinearScale);function CohortChart(_ref){let{data}=_ref;console.log(data);const chartData={labels:data.map(item=>item.cohort),datasets:[{label:"Total Lifetime Value",data:data.map(item=>item.cohortCustomers),backgroundColor:"rgba(239, 146, 52, 0.4)",borderColor:"rgba(239, 146, 52, 0.8)",borderWidth:1}]};const options={responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{position:"top"},title:{display:true,text:"Customer Lifetime Value by Cohort"}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:chartData,options:options});}export default CohortChart;
